channel.title: [pi] hunter lootz
channel.description: on my 317 [pi] i have hunter, and i can catch everything and level, etc.. but when i get the jars, i want to be able to receive loot from them. when you click loot, it does nothing. If I cant fix, i'm most likely to just put an "i buy anything" person there and make prices, but i want the loot :) please help if you can. rep++ to help you out. thanks

item.title: [pi] hunter lootz
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Add it into one of the clicking classes. (Try ClickItem, ClickObject, ClickingButtons? Like I said I don’t do PI, so I’m not sure.)

And it probably would be easier to have it be a command-

if (playerCommand.startsWith("loot")) { c.getItem().deleteItem("####"); c.getItem().addItem("####"); }

EDIT: Making it give a random item- http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,338418.msg3458910.html#msg3458910

Credits to RASH.

Read full topic

if u want loot, you have to make a random reward like the barrows

item.title: [pi] hunter lootz
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:2, topic:399480”]I’m not posotive, but it’s probably something like-

if (itemID == ####) { c.getItem().deleteItem("####"); c.getItem().addItem("###"); }

I’m not a PI person, so I probably won’t be able to help you much if that doesn’t work.[/quote]

hmm. where would i add this to? and do you think it would be easier if i tried to make a command instead?

Read full topic
